channel.title: [PI] Smithing isn't working
channel.description:
When I try to do smithing on my PI server I click on the furnace and a menu comes up to choose what you want to smith, the buttons there don't work. I'm guessing I could go into my buttonclicking.java and fix this but what would I code for the buttons?
The code for my smithing.java won't fit. :\
The code for my furnace: [code] case 3044: c.getSmithing().sendSmelting(); break; [/code]
Basically, what I need help with, is coding the buttons for the furnace. I need to know what to code into Clickingbuttons.java.
Thanks for reading.
Just tell me if you need more explanation.

item.title: [PI] Smithing isn't working
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

When I try to do smithing on my PI server I click on the furnace and a menu comes up to choose what you want to smith, the buttons there don’t work. I’m guessing I could go into my buttonclicking.java and fix this but what would I code for the buttons?

The code for my smithing.java won’t fit. :\

The code for my furnace:

			case 3044:
				c.getSmithing().sendSmelting();
			break;

Basically, what I need help with, is coding the buttons for the furnace. I need to know what to code into Clickingbuttons.java.

Thanks for reading.

Just tell me if you need more explanation.

Read full topic
